sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-chart class="mychart" :options="options"></v-chart>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      options: {
        xAxis: {
          type: "category",
          data: ["Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat", "Sun"],
        },
        yAxis: {
          type: "value",
        },
        series: [
          {
            data: [120, 200, 150, 80, 70, 110, 130],
            type: "bar",
            showBackground: true,
            backgroundStyle: {
              color: "rgba(180, 180, 180, 0.2)",
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>
}
<style lang="less" scoped>
.mychart {
    width: 100%;
    height: 800px;
}
</style>
